The current version of the application
The destination directory for uploaded digital object files
The maximum width for derived reference images
The number of records shown per page on list pages
When set to "yes", the reference code string will be built using the information object identifier plus the identifiers of all its ancestors
When set to "no", the repository name is excluded from certain displays because it will be too repetitive
This value must be at least %min% pixels
This value can not be greater than %max% pixels
You must show at least %min% hits per page
You cannot show more than %max% hits per page
When set to "yes", this system will respond to OAI harvesting requests
add an alpha-numeric code to uniquely identify this particular OAI repository within its network domain to create a unique, OAI-compliant identifier, e.g. oai:foo.org:repositorycode_10001
The number of entities to include in a single OAI response list before inserting a resumption token
This value must be at least %min%
This value cannot be more than %max%
the code can only contain letters and numbers
your email address is not a valid format
URI to the OAI-PMH port of the Repository to be added
Sorry, OAI harvesting is disabled for this system.
Hierarchical list of menus for the site, first column
The name of this menu. The menu name is used internally and is not visible to users.
This is the button or link label that users see. For menu items that are not visible (i.e. are organizational only) this should be left blank.
This can be an external URL (starts with http(s)://) or an internal, symfony path (e.g. module/action).
A brief description of the menu and it's purpose.
